lender.name: Zach
lender.loan_because: I loan because Christ told us to be charitable and to be good stewards of our money. What I have is better spent on these folks than myself.
lender.occupational_info: I'm just a college student that fits in a few hours of work here and there.

lender.name: Mahendra
lender.loan_because: To give a helping hand to the hardworking individuals with good vision to advance to the next phase in their business.

lender.name: Shoni-Cody
lender.loan_because: from the first time I heard about KIVA I wanted to give to this organisation, because I believe that most people just need a little bit of help to be able to stand on their own two feet, and support themselfs and create a better life for their family. - I like to give a chance.- So, my kids and I held a big bake sale to benefit KIVA.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: As I have worked hard and made my dreams come true I want to give others the chance to strive to achieve their own dreams for themselves and others.
lender.occupational_info: I help design the electrical systems for office buildings. I work with architects and construction companies to create buildings that people can work in and be comfortable and productive. I help design light systems and providing power connections for all the equipment in buildings; heat, lights, computers etc.

lender.name: caileigh
lender.loan_because: I have no reason not to!

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in my life. I want to give to others the help that they need to become self-sufficient, just like my family and others did for me.
lender.occupational_info: I teach music to 10 to 18 year-olds at an International School in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.

lender.name: Victor
lender.loan_because: We belong to each other- Mother Teresa
lender.occupational_info: I'm Blessed

lender.name: carol
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to, and I want women-owned businesses to have a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a college geology department, caring for materials, assisting the professors, and setting up lab experiences to teach students about our Earth.

lender.name: Anchorage Rotaract
lender.loan_because: One of Rotaract's main areas of service is International Service. We wanted to get into this field and Kiva seemed like the perfect path. We are very impressed with the work that Kiva does and we plan to stay with them for a long time.
lender.occupational_info: Rotaract is a Rotary-sponsored service club for young men and women ages 18 to 30. The Anchorage Rotaract Club is sponsored by Anchorage East Rotary and Anchorage Downtown Rotary. If you want to serve your community, enhance your leadership skills; build relationships within the community, all while promoting international understanding and peace through a framework of friendship and service, then Rotaract is the place for you!

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: To help give hard working people a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I own a personal training gym in Stamford, CT.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.occupational_info: Aesthetics is a career dedicated to helping others to look and feel better. I am a specialist who offers preventive skin care and give treatments to keep skin healthy and attractive.

lender.name: EcoQuo
lender.loan_because: EcoQuo seeks to help the developing world become green.

lender.name: erika
lender.loan_because: its a way to take a little money and make a big impact to someones life.
lender.occupational_info: I research and document artifacts relating to Australia's history.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: Community Work

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: I can. I am lucky to have money, so that I can send it to others that can also benefit from it.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a professional consultant to people and companies within the agriculture and biofuels sectors.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: As an entrepreneur and the mother of four young women, I especially want to support women in business.

lender.name: Neena
lender.loan_because: My father always believed in helping people (esp. women) get a chance at a better life. I donate in his memory.
lender.occupational_info: I am able to share my love of books and reading with others.

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: I think this is a wonderful way to help people accomplish their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I write TV & film scripts.

lender.name: Boni Maroni
lender.loan_because: The first time I saw a piece on PBS about KIVA I got a smile on my face. It just seemed to damn good, but yet I still smiled. I didn't give for quite some time because I was still kinda leery. Leeriness subsided. I started to lend and it felt good to do my small little part. Got in a bit of trouble with the good ol' IRS but I'm back on the site. Got a new job so back to doing my small part in this goodness.

lender.name: Peggy
lender.loan_because: I have lived in Mexico and have seen how much a small loan can mean to someone who is trying to support their family and escape poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I own a small hotel on the shore of beautiful Lake Superior.

lender.name: Susie
lender.loan_because: Those who are able are obligated.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher of high school students (ages 14-18. I am passionate about reading and want to inspire my students to be involved and empathetic about the world around them.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: Women owning their own businesses is one of the best ways to fight poverty and help children.
lender.occupational_info: By better understanding economics, people can make better choices.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: It is the most empowering way to help.
lender.occupational_info: I'm in the semiconductor industry.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: Money belongs to God and its for us to use to help each other :)
lender.occupational_info: I buy and sell old interesting objects, like pottery, art and furniture.

lender.name: Collette
lender.loan_because: I was invited and wanted to give a helping hand towards dreams being realized.
lender.occupational_info: While traveling in other countries, I write about the cultures and everything I experience.

lender.name: Ironmonkey6
lender.loan_because: To lend is something quickly forgotten if it is not asked. Kiva makes us aware that you can lend responsibly and to people who unlike people who usually lend spend their money on their independance. Isn't that what freedom is all about?
lender.occupational_info: I am currently looking for a better job while attending school.

lender.name: Monique
lender.loan_because: I can and I care.

lender.name: Antoine
lender.loan_because: my parents think it's a good idea

lender.name: dawn
lender.loan_because: i can.

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because: I realize that something so small to me, can mean the world to someone less fortunate. It's important to help others be happy and successful.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a senior in High School, and will soon be going to Carleton College in Northfield, MN.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I want to help people take care of their families and communities.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to foreign students in Chicago.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: "To whom much is given, much is expected"

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: with Kiva because the gift of giving just keeps on repaying itself. Each time you send in a loan and it bounces back PAID you play it forward again to someone or a group whose lives around the world are forever changed. We can all make a difference and with Kiva the difference is the number of people you can positively impact over and over again.

lender.name: William
lender.occupational_info: Teaching the next generation of scientists, and learning through research how human cells are affected by the DNA damage arising from aging and environmental toxicants

lender.name: Monica Samara
lender.occupation: REVENDEDORA OF DE FRAGANCIA PERFUMES FAMOSOS OF CO
lender.loan_because: I NEED 500 DOLARES, POWER TO GET A ESTOQUE OF PRODUCT FOR DELIVERY PRONTA BECAUSE THE RETURN OF INCOME AND GUARANTEED IN REAL 66%
lender.occupational_info: SALE OF PRODUCTS OF DOOR DOOR IN EU AND WHERE MY FRIENDS ARE TAKING SUCESSOS IN SALES

lender.name: CA Third Grade
lender.loan_because: We wanted to help people around the world, and learn about different countries.
lender.occupational_info: We are students in third grade, we are 8 and 9 years old.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I understand what it is like to work for yourself, it can be difficult but it is most rewarding. These people are more than willing to work hard to help themselves and their families, a quality I admire, and if I can help them to achieve their dreams then I am very happy to do so.

lender.name: Stuart
lender.loan_because: This is the best way of giving to people who are prepared to help themselves

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: Pay if forward
lender.occupational_info: I supervise a crew of people that produce printed products from high speed printers and digital web presses.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I borrow
lender.occupational_info: 40 yrs old, 1 child, single.

lender.name: The Amlin Family
lender.loan_because: Our daddy wants us to learn to help people and make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: Our daddy is a principal at a public school.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: I should and I can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach employees in a big company.

lender.name: Murphy & Karl
lender.loan_because:
The value of just a few US dollars is multiplied by making it available to hardworking people who just need some credit to succeed.
I love the huge return in human benefit on such a small investment of capital!
lender.occupational_info: Finance and operations management

lender.name: David and Susan
lender.loan_because: it is a way to give back, and to somehow try to balance the injustice of the world.
lender.occupational_info: David is an actor - he performs, teaches, directs, and clowns in childrens hospitals. He is touring with his one-man show "7 (x 1) Samurai" this summer. Susan is an interpreter for the Deaf - using American Sign Language to help those that can hear communicate with those who cannot.

lender.name: Mark, Michelle & Jack
lender.loan_because: its a chance to tell a brother or sister we will probably never meet how much we care about them. (Thanks Kiva.)
lender.occupational_info: I help make sure medical devices that help paralyzed people breath work properly.

lender.name: Melinda
lender.loan_because: Sharing and opportunity go hand in hand and with the world getting smaller we can embrace those whose lives can be included in the world of civilized society by giving more meaning to an otherwise struggling existence. It is only by this can we consider ourselves rich.
lender.occupational_info: I try to make a house more of a home by using novel and creative ideas to improve the look and comfort of the people who live there. Many things are not always what make a beautiful home but the arrangement and colors that express the personalities of the families who reside within. This ability can make even the most spartan of homes a treasure.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I care about the entrepreneurial spirit across the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help create companies.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: I've got some money to spare and it I'm glad to lend it to someone who will make some god use of it

lender.name: Bodie
lender.loan_because: I have been given so much.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people see their potential.

lender.name: Markus
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I believe that it will make a difference in somebody's life.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school, then I do homework

lender.name: Bianca
lender.loan_because: I feel that I am blessed and that it is my responsibility to give back to the world whenever I can. It makes me feel happy inside to be able to help!

lender.name: rusidi
lender.loan_because: I wish to look for capital aid which without using warrant , help me
lender.occupational_info: I will be open, but conducting non having capital, I wan selling clothes of , yarn, cloth, hitherto look for which fund aid without warrant very difficult... request aid to [all] donor, if effort I can success, I will return, and hopefully I also can assist my brothers and sisters which still insufficiency.

lender.name: Cicley
lender.loan_because: i support the concept of mirco loans and hope to use Kiva as a way to effectively reach folks around the world

lender.name: Shaan
lender.loan_because: I hate poor people
lender.occupational_info: I write stuff to sell stuff.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I want to help families around the world live comfortably one step at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I help provide services for children under three years old that have developmental delays. I connect their families to the services they need (such as physical therapy or speech therapy), and provide support and resources to their families.

lender.name: Alissa
lender.loan_because: probably for the same reason that flowers give their pollen to bee's and tree's give us oxygen.

lender.name: Shane
lender.loan_because: I have the opportunity to help further someones dream and help them better their life

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Kayaktion-Dan
lender.loan_because: I kayak around the world and never knew how I could help the people of these great places. Now I know exactly how my small company, Kayaktion, can help.
lender.occupational_info: I have a kayaking website that's linking paddlers with other paddlers and with outfitters in destinations around the world.

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: People who work hard and earn a living are what drives everyone's prosperity and happiness.
lender.occupational_info: Computers for a health care center.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I love everything about Kiva! It's so much fun to connect with small business people around the world and watch them turn their dreams into reality.

lender.name: Chuck
lender.loan_because: Gotta do more than just talk.
lender.occupational_info: Slow.

lender.name: shannon
lender.loan_because: I am learning more and more about money, poverty, access, and cooperation, and I like the idea of micro finance and do it yourself business financing. I hope to continue to be inspired by people's stories, and create my own stories, while I strive to follow my own path.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a nurse and run a small creative business.

lender.name: Carole
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me and wants me to share with others.

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs an opportunity. I like the idea of helping people who are working to fulfill their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I advise companies who are looking to make major changes to their business.

lender.name: Chun Kiat, Lucas
lender.loan_because: i would want to reach out to make a difference to someone else's family & loved ones
lender.occupational_info: making a difference in someone's life in their Personal & Financial situation. Optimising & Re-discovering their current resources

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. I like people. I like people who help themselves. Make hay while the sun shines.
lender.occupational_info: I market my clients and their products to the masses.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Make all the computers work all the time, and it is a lot of computers.

lender.name: Cecilia
lender.loan_because: it is so easy to help in a meaningful way.
lender.occupational_info: I am a family doctor. I take care of the health of people of all ages.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference for the good of others... and I feel my life is more connected to neighbors near and far.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because:
I believe in "Pay It Forward". If more people were to help the less fortunate without expecting repayment...the world would be a much better place.
"When the power of love overcomes the love of power, the world will know peace."
-- Sri Chinmoy Ghose --
lender.occupational_info: I ensure data keeps moving through the Internet exactly where it's suppose to go.

lender.name: Victor
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves and one another through the wonder of voluntary value-for-value exchange.
lender.occupational_info: I write adventure fiction to excite, entertain, and uplift.

lender.name: Jenni
lender.loan_because: All my basic needs are met, and then some. I can't justify the time and money I spend on myself when I look at some of the poorest in the world and wonder, what would they tell me is necessary. I want to do good and make a better situation for someone that couldn't otherwise.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a nurse in a hospital, taking care of people that have cancer and are very sick.

lender.name: Venkateshwaralu
lender.loan_because: I believe in making a difference :)

lender.name: Clive Girdham
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Clive Girdham is a Sydney based photographer who specializes in teaching photography.

lender.name: tran
lender.loan_because: I want to do something that can make big money and make my dream becomes true. I want to start a business in order to change my life.

lender.name: Zac
lender.loan_because: I think that microcredit is a revolutionary tool to help motivated people help themselves, and to motivate people who would otherwise be unmotivated.

lender.name: senthil
lender.loan_because: to Develop my business and to over come from financial crisis
lender.occupational_info: Our business is involved in the printing industry, banner printing in flux, vinayls and sign board My previous machine is been bought in seconds and it's making lot of trouble and i want to import a new one so I need funds as loan.

lender.name: Marcel
lender.loan_because: I like the kiva-project and their way of giving
lender.occupational_info: I advise profit and non-profit organisations and individuals, concerning profit, income, estate, property taxes in the Netherlands and also international taxes. I prepare opinions on tax liability resulting from prospective and past transactions. I represent clients in tax litigation.

lender.name: Suzanna
lender.loan_because: Because we all need to open doors for people to have better lives.

lender.name: Nuhu
lender.loan_because: I want to expand my business which is the sale of class'C' drugs
lender.occupational_info: My business is selling of medicines in a small area in my locality which includes paracetamol,brufen,tetracycline,malafan,teedar and others.

lender.name: Ursula
lender.loan_because: I love peoples stories and I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I work designing improvements to bridges to keep our roadways safe.

lender.name: Kristrn Tinna
lender.loan_because: They say give a man a fish and hell eat for a day, give a man a fish pole an hell eat for a lifetime!

lender.name: Sherry
lender.loan_because:
I want to help to improve the economic stadning of people around the world that aren't as lucky as we are to be born in this country.
I also want to allow the rest of the world to see what a kind, generous and wonderful people we are.
lender.occupational_info: I teach partner dancing to people of all ages at Austin Uptown Dance.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I should. It's something I can do for those who need a boost from someone who has received several.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because:
1. I want to help people who so desperately want to help themselves and their families.
2. They are not looking for handouts, but merely a hand up.
3. We tend to take what we have for granted and even a modest loan of $25.00 is enough to start some entrepreneur on their way to financial independence.
4. What a great way to eradicate poverty.
5. I firmly believe that to those whom much is given, much is expected.
lender.occupational_info: I am a real estate attorney. I represent people who wish to buy or sell real estate in Massachusetts.

lender.name: Abigail Fisher
lender.loan_because: I believe.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a venture capital firm. We invest in young technology companies just starting out. Less than ten people work at my firm, so it's different every day. We have a lot of fun.

lender.name: Sabrina
lender.loan_because: I am helping to assist and empower women globally to excel in business and in life.
lender.occupational_info: I help women be successful leaders and entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Gene and Barbara
lender.loan_because: They Need

lender.name: Katrina
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I study how and why people make mistakes when doing high risk activities

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: It's good to share.
lender.occupational_info: I prosecute white collar criminals.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I'm a pretty lucky guy ... I wouldn't call my life a "charmed life", really, but it's pretty darn good. I've had such good luck when I need a lift, that it makes me happy to" spread a little sunshine" or "pay it forward", as they say.
lender.occupational_info:
I am part of a team that helps to maintain a website that allows people all across Canada to post free classified ads.
I also have a home business converting and restoring music from old records and tapes to CD/digital format. This is also a personal hobby; you can check out my blog at the link below!

lender.name: Ana
lender.loan_because: I am excited and honored to be even a small part of the energy that can help an individual or group achieve success.
lender.occupational_info: I match spaces with individuals, resulting in stronger financial and spiritual opportunities, creating a base for the journey.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: For my 50th birthday my girlfriend introduced me to Kiva as my gift. It was a wonderful gift for me and for the folks who recieve help from this program. Thanks Donya.

lender.name: Alexander family
lender.loan_because: like the concept of helping others with recyclable funds. It appeals to my compassionate conservative sense of lending resources to those who simply want better and are willing to work at their own industry.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired Los Angeles Deputy Sheriff (policeman).

lender.name: Karyn
lender.loan_because: I want to make a small difference in the world. I feel doing these loans is a great way to do this. My husband and I have raised 2 children & taken in 4 homeless kids which is another way we have given back to society.
lender.occupational_info: I have my own business Camp Bow Wow training dogs which I have done for over 25 yrs. This is my passion in life. My breed of choice is the English Cocker Spaniel. I recently opened an Ebay store selling dog supplies the store is called Spaniel Supplies.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I want to loan because I want the world to be a better place for everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I would describe my work like doing chores around the house.

lender.name: Himansu
lender.loan_because: Generally speaking, people tend to be poor because of the circumstances in which they are born and not because they are lazy or untalented (not their fault). Kiva makes it so easy for us to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer software.

lender.name: Tess
lender.loan_because: I want to see change in the world. I believe in microfinance and believe that this supports economies and does not hurt them. I love people and want to see their dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time college student studying International Community Development. I study alot!

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to help anyway I can
lender.occupational_info: I fly passengers to many different destinations

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: It's such a simple, inexpensive way to make a difference in the world.

lender.name: St Thomas Church
lender.loan_because: We understand that we have been blessed so that we can be a blessing to others
lender.occupational_info: We are a community that tries to live as disciples of Jesus.

lender.name: Nico Terpak
lender.loan_because: I want to create a better world

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves opportunity.

lender.name: nuno
lender.loan_because: WE ARE ONE

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: Any small amount can help another person. An amount that we consider lunch money has so much more meaning to so many others in the world. My small contribution will help and so will yours.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the finance office of a major hospital in the United States.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: This is such a great idea. I think we should be promoting and helping people who want to help themselves out! I am so supportive of people who want to reach their dreams and I believe in you all :)
lender.occupational_info: I look after surface water (water that falls on the ground when it rains which runs off the ground) to help ensure that it is clean and reduces chances of flooding.

lender.name: Trish
lender.loan_because: I know that our pooled resources can add up and truly help those in need.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: Micro-financing, through an enterprise like Kiva, has the power to improve the lives of individuals, communities, countries, and ultimately the world.

lender.name: Vincent
lender.loan_because: I wish to help someone fulfill their dreams of a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a schoolteacher for 19 year usually helping those students that may have a more difficult time in the regular classroom setting.

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to help someone help themselves and therefore their community
lender.occupational_info: I work with women who went to a Catholic High School and encourge them to live out the mission of the school of life, leadership and service

lender.name: Laureano
lender.occupation: Grad. student, freelance writer and translator
lender.loan_because: I would like to help KIVA promote micro-economic growth, financial freedom, and entrepreneurship throughout Latin America.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a graduate student and a freelance writer, interpreter, translator (Spanish, English, French)

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I want to support farmers because it is a hard and challenging life that requires someone with great creativity and stamina. I know because I fight the weather and struggle to feed my poultry everyday! Good Luck to Farmers! We need it!
lender.occupational_info: Poultry Farmer of rare breeds. I show and sell birds and eggs

lender.name: Roderick
lender.loan_because: It empowers people

lender.name: Marilee
lender.loan_because: Kiva is such a wonderful idea. To think we can help others so directly and with no interest charged. A brilliant idea.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I want to help others in any way I can and this seems to be a very worthwhile endeavor.
lender.occupational_info: I work with 12 and 13 year olds, helping them improve their reading and writing.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I not only lend to greatly impact the lives of the entrepreneurs I lend to, but also to impact my life and the lives of those around me. Understanding the economic and social problems in developing countries is most effective at a personal level. By connecting with people around the world and then sharing with our neighbors, we can help ourselves and each other better see and make progress towards fixing these problems.

lender.name: Noah
lender.loan_because: Money is necessary to create positive business activity which will benefit the community. If you don't have any money and want to create that positive business activity someone has to lend it to you.
lender.occupational_info: I assist people in starting their own businesses for mutual financial benefit.

lender.name: Ian
lender.occupational_info: I design equiptment for cell phone towers.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: Because I have so much to be thankful for!

lender.name: Kathleen Toronto Ontario
lender.loan_because: it will help women become self sufficient and independent, which ultimately will empower their children.

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because: we're all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: Pen to paper, fingers to keypad, feet to soil--I'm a writer and a traveler.

lender.name: maxine
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a little help now & then, and if you can offer it & support someone, why the heck not?
lender.occupational_info: I manage inventory of products and place orders for more product.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I want to help make someone else's life a little easier and to pass along the blessings I have been given.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I believe that most people want to succeed and just need a hand sometimes.
lender.occupational_info: I am a chiropractor. I treat people with neck and back problems and keep them functioning at their optimal ability

lender.name: Maria Joao
lender.loan_because: its great to help somebody to be independent.

lender.name: Jonek
lender.loan_because: I got a $25 gift certificate from my friend Noah. I've really enjoyed it, and I've given two gift certificates myself.

lender.name: Leah
lender.loan_because: I think it is our duty to help others and if you have the means to help I think its your duty to!
lender.occupational_info: Everyday I go to school, and hopefully after to that to collage, I am thinking about going into music therapy.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: Better someone else uses my money, I'll just spend it on booze.
lender.occupational_info: Graphic design, book production, non-profit business development in Africa

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: This is how my family can help in a small and significant way.
lender.occupational_info: I help soothe peoples physical pain and help them heal themselves in body, mind & spirit.

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: my family and I agree that this is the right thing to do for hard working people who need just a little help.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people to play musical instruments.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: it makes my heart sing to help.
lender.occupational_info: I photograph people and create images that radiate essence, love and energy.

lender.name: Lorne
lender.loan_because: I want to assist people to help themselves

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Keith
lender.occupation: Vice President and Chief Operating Officer

lender.name: Erika
lender.loan_because: I feel that everyone in the world deserves the good fortune that I have had.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying psychology at a University. I am also volunteering as the education program assistant for a fabulous non-pofit, BeadforLife.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: I want to give people the opportunity to improve their lives.

lender.name: MARGARET ANN
lender.loan_because: i really need to get my own business establish n to take goodcare of my familes in future.
lender.occupational_info: my work is about cookin n also havin a pastries too also helpin in parties,funeral n any ceremonies takin place.

lender.name: Kingsley
lender.loan_because: I like to help someone to improve thier life.

lender.name: Ross
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Daphna
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a classroom with eight 3-5 year old children supporting their social-emotional development in Oakland, California USA.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: My uncle gave me a Kiva gift certificate for christmas Again!! And it is nice to be able to help people over and over again!
lender.occupational_info: I am 11 years old. I am in grade 5. I live in CANADA.

lender.name: bernie
lender.loan_because: I think every human being needs help and a littlle assistance at one time or another.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired and have been very lucky in my lfe.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: honestly, my friend told me to. But now I see how helpful this site can be.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a store that sells gear to all sorts of travelers.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I have been the recient of such abundance and I just want to share some of it so I can enrich the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I offer structured finance services in large commercial real estate transactions and I also teach anatomy and physiology as a college.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I believe the American Dream should transcend borders.
lender.occupational_info: I am the technical director for a medium sized marketing company that sells high performance plastic for use in construction.

lender.name: Murray
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with good fortune and wish to help others in their endeavors.
lender.occupational_info: I work at finding work for Actors in film and television

lender.name: Wesley
lender.loan_because: my wife and I would like to make this world a better place for our children.

lender.name: Myles
lender.occupational_info: I work for a computer company.

lender.name: Saki
lender.loan_because: I am drawn to support entrepreneurial women who are doing their best to take care of their families. I love this beneficial aspect of the power of money - to be able to lend the same funds over and over again, prosperity and abundance in a constant flow.
lender.occupational_info: I do bookkeeping and manage commercial property and homeowners associations for clients.

lender.name: michael
lender.loan_because: i want to help people who are trying to better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: i set up trade shows and conventions, in boston, massachusetts, usa

lender.name: Andrew von Gregor
lender.loan_because:
When I was a child, my family and I were very, very poor. My late father was a violent alcoholic and for some time we were homeless and car-less, too. Thankfully, various people helped us along the way (strangers mostly), and eventually we [my mother, three younger siblings and I] were no longer in that awful situation.
I loan here at Kiva because I can, and because I believe this is a wonderful concept brought to reality to help people caught in the mire of poverty, and thus make this world a better place for everyone.
You always hear people say, "Someone should do something about that [problem in the world]." Well, I am someone and--with the help of Kiva.org--I am doing something. (...And if you are able to be online and read this, so should YOU!)
lender.occupational_info: I am a professional composer and guitarist living in Hollywood, CA.

lender.name: Beems
lender.loan_because: I believe that all beings deserve happiness, security, and health.
lender.occupational_info: teaching people how to breath, move and relax

lender.name: R&J
lender.loan_because: This is the way the world turns
lender.occupational_info: R works her mind to maintain databases that help non-profits communicate with their communities; J works with his hands to makes people's houses their homes

lender.name: Anni
lender.loan_because: I hope to make a difference in the world

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping women to improve their own lives.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: Every little bit counts
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: I love it! This is a way that anyone, with as many pennies or dollars they can afford, can support others working to take care of their families and grow their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I design garden's and landscapes using native and other low water usage/drought tolerant plants. There is a water crisis in the world!

lender.name: Errol
lender.loan_because: I want a better world for myself and family. I live my life with the belief that my small actions can make a life a little better. I cannot change the world; but I can live my life, in a manner, that touches other human beings, as if, they are my extended family; and in so doing make a positive change for at least one individual.
lender.occupational_info: Use radiation to help people deal with cancer.

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: Own and manage 62 units of Section 8 Housing

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: Genuine capitalism works,and everyone should get the chance to experience the prosperity it creates.

lender.name: BScN-Ottawa U
lender.loan_because: we want to empower people and we are greatful to have the opportunity through this amazing organization.
lender.occupational_info: We are 1st and 2nd year Bachelor of Science Nursing students from the University of Ottawa on the Algonquin Pembroke Campus.

lender.name: hap hathaway
lender.loan_because: my tribe is my responsibility, as i am my tribe's responsibility.
lender.occupational_info: i am just tryin to do what i can

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I know that I'm very lucky to be born in America, to have a good education and a good job. I have worked for many years in developing countries and know how hard people work to make a living. A little bit of cash can go a long way to making a better life and it makes me feel very good to be a small part of the success of the people who borrow money to make business.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others to better themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Giving because it matters...

lender.name: Danae
lender.loan_because: I was lucky enough to be born into circumstances where I could get all the education I needed, and could do anything I wanted to do. I'd like to help others do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I care for pregnant women who are having problems with their pregnancies, and help them when they are delivering their babies.

lender.name: Ralf
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people

lender.name: Jaime and Patrick
lender.loan_because: Patrick gave me a Kiva gift certificate with the message, "A small effort to share a little of our immense happiness with someone else. Happy Valentine's Day." I am so touched by this gift and want to begin sharing my many blessings with others across the globe.
lender.occupational_info: Patrick and I are both pursuing graduate degrees in the arts at the School of the Art Institute of Chicago in the United States. I paint and build installations and Patrick creates situational feedback loops with people, technology, and a dash of love!

lender.name: BeCause
lender.loan_because: It's acting locally on a global scale.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I have lived and travelled extensively in third world countries and know how hard it is for those citizens to rise above the economic level that they are born in to. This is just another way of extending hope to them, of actually participating in an act that can permanently improve their situation and their lives.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: Never before has it been so easy to partner with entrepreneurs across the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find and share information on the Web, and work together online.

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: i want to change the world one person at a time

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I recently completed a project on energization in Namibia through my school. I love the African people and their culture and enjoy helping the people as much as I can.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an Electrical Engineer working in Houston, TX.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it can be to get your own business started and generate funds. AND so much harder in a country where funds are scarce. It's great to be part of helping someone get going.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graphic and web designer, presently working from a home studio.

lender.name: Candice
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves an equal chance to start a new life and achieve a dream.
lender.occupational_info: legal services for the U.S. armed forces.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: Life is about helping each other.
lender.occupational_info: I design two way radio equipment.

lender.name: Brooklyn Cares
lender.loan_because: A nation's culture resides in the hearts and in the soul of its people. -Mohandas Gandhi

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: as a former Peace Corps volunteer I know that micro-financing works.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Spanish to middle school students. I also try to teach social responsibility throughout my lessons.

lender.name: pam
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Leanne Slesinger
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: It's a nice way to help other people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to adult immigrants in San Francisco, California.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: It's always the smallest of things that make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a full-time graduate student - PhD studies in Education. I also consult part-time in the area of adult ESL education. I really look forward to being back in the ESL classroom!

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: we are encouraging business and trade which I believe is more sustainable than short term hand outs

lender.name: douglas
lender.loan_because:
Step 1) Make interest free loans to the working poor of the world
Step 2)
Step 3) Profit!
On a more serious note :)
" 'When you reap the harvest of your land, do not reap to the very edges of your field or gather the gleanings of your harvest. Leave them for the poor and the alien. I am the LORD your God.' " Leviticus 23:22
"In the same way, let your light shine before men, that they may see your good deeds and praise your Father in heaven." Matthew 5:16
I am my brother's keeper.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Registered Nurse working in a local hospital in my new home town in Missouri

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: "We love, because he first loved us."
lender.occupational_info: I am currently training to become a pilot in the US Air Force.

lender.name: Rohini
lender.loan_because: Would like to make a small difference.

lender.name: brenda
lender.loan_because: It is something I can do easily to help someone out...golden rule!

lender.name: Jerry and Mary
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. And it's fun watching the progress.
lender.occupational_info: Mary is a nurse and Jerry is a fit specialist for cycling and we both feel pretty lucky to have so much. We think this is a wonderful opportunity to empower people to lift themselves out of poverty. We are all part of the same family and we should help our brothers and sisters whenever possible.

lender.name: Lars-Erik
lender.loan_because: It's a good way to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: It's a great idea
lender.occupational_info: I report the news of my community through photography and words. My work is published on the internet and in a newspaper.

lender.name: Jason Wang
lender.loan_because: It is more blessed to give than to receive.

lender.name: Gabriel
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to make a positive difference, however small, in the lives of people around the world
lender.occupational_info: Install, support and maintain various IT infrastructure systems for an electric transmission utility company

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: Its highly rewarding
lender.occupational_info: I work with companies that help develop new medications

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: I want to pay it forward

lender.name: Julio Macias
lender.loan_because: People from third world countries need credit just like we need credit in developed countries. A few dollars have a major impact on their business ventures. Local big banks only service lower risk ventures as in the US. Big banks are part the problem, we at kiva are part of the solution.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an immigrant from Bolivia and now naturalized US Citizen working here for the past 27 years. I own a wireless retail store. We sell cell phones, satellite equipment and accessories. For more information please visit our website and click below.

lender.name: Ram
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I develop computer software that help researchers diagnose and cure various diseases. I also work as a computer security consultant both freelance and for UCLA.

lender.name: Thomas Meaney
lender.loan_because: I believe in sharing.

lender.name: Mia
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone has a right to a dream come true.
lender.occupational_info: Capital Finance, Marketing and Distribution, Branding, Manufacturing

lender.name: Jun
lender.loan_because: it is the same thing with my current business.
lender.occupational_info: like Y!Combinator, my company helps the entreprenuer of web business, especially seed or startup stage.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: I believe that helping women is the best way to help everyone.

lender.name: Victor
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone should get access to financing for their projects

lender.name: Larissa
lender.loan_because: people around the world do not have the opportunities and basic amenities I enjoy and take for granted. It seems selfish not to share when I can.
lender.occupational_info: Doctor

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: Gift Certificate given to me.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people become better after illness. I help them regain strength, endurance, walking...so they can live with a better quality of life.

lender.name: Julie & Stephen
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do. I have always made donations to organizations, but Kiva has allowed me to give more by getting to know people and their causes. Without Kiva, I would not know about these different people.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the banking industry.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: Gof is good to me and I would like to share my blessings with others who only need a helping hand to better themselves.

lender.name: Taryn
lender.occupational_info: I work in a university grants office and also run an alternative biweekly newspaper.

lender.name: Cole Papers, Inc.
lender.occupational_info: We are a family owned company, founded in 1918. We sell & distribute janitorial supplies, paper supplies, fine printing paper, hotel amenities, and have a wholesale flooring division. We operate 8 branch offices and one corporate headquarters. We employ 170 people in 3 states.

lender.name: Phyllis
lender.loan_because: I want to give "out of my need."
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired high school art teacher and artist.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I CAN!!

lender.name: Pradeep
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreuner myself. I have retail solar business as a side business. I know what it feels like when you don't have the money to support your business.
lender.occupational_info: Protect the environment, Stop poverty even if our government can't. Do everything in your life time to help someone. No one can judge you because you can't, but make an effort

lender.name: Karlo
lender.loan_because: I can afford to.

lender.name: Ty Ovendale
lender.loan_because: Alleviating poverty is the only way to ensure a peaceful world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a data analyst and software developer in the retail industry.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I'm a strong supporter of the Free Market and libertarian ideals. This site and this manner of investment are prime examples of why and how the free market works and can make an important impact in the world.

lender.name: Nanette
lender.loan_because: I have so much. It seems wrong not to.
lender.occupational_info: I design and write custom financial software.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering other people to make change in their own lives rather than imposing my views on others or simply handing out an unsustainable material gift.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a venture philanthropy nonprofit organization that funds proven nonprofit models to replicate in Boston.

lender.name: Hendra&Nessy&Harira
lender.loan_because: It is just lovely to know that we, with our small amount of money, could join others to lend entrepreneurs around the world. Thank you Kiva. We hope more lenders will join and of course more field partners and fellows to bring up more entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: Hendra works in financial sector. His dream: to be a writer some day, or a teacher for small kids. Nessy left her job in 2007 due to pregnancy and now stays home taking care of Harira (see how cute she is as shown in the profile picture).

lender.name: Stacy
lender.loan_because: An individual has not started living until he can rise above the narrow confines of his individualistic concerns to the broader concerns of all humanity. -Martin Luther King, Jr.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: These funds go towards motivated individuals who ask.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children and help them to become better readers.
